author: elfontan
body:
#### PR description:
Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37453 to **CMSSW_12_3_0**.

A full set of xml files for the L1 emulation of prescales and masks coherent with the updated L1 menu for Run 3 has been created and pushed to [L1Trigger-L1TGlobal](https://github.com/cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TGlobal) ([PR#9](https://github.com/cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TGlobal/pull/9)). A backport of these files has been requested in the github issue https://github.com/cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TGlobal/issues/10. Changes will be backported to **CMSSW_12_3_0** in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/7770 after the tests.

#### PR validation:
Basic tests performed successfully starting from CMSSW_12_3_X_2022-04-07-1100.
> cmsrel CMSSW_12_3_X_2022-04-07-1100
> cd CMSSW_12_3_X_2022-04-07-1100/src
> cmsenv
> git cms-addpkg L1Trigger/Configuration
> git cms-addpkg L1Trigger/L1TGlobal
> git cherry-pick 36263094dc3c4615ca636402333d485859005ab6
> scram b distclean 
> git cms-checkdeps -a -A
> scram b -j 8
> scram b runtests
> scram build code-checks
> scram build code-format
title: [Backport] New set of files coherent with the new v1_0_0 L1Menu
